values:
dude, its time i updated.
i got hammered last night and went to a party where i ran into my neighbors and told a boy i was proud of him as  he was trying to convince a bunch of straightees that was gay. alex and i built a fort. i have a booboo on both thumbs. i need to go out and bike in the rain...i wish it was warm and raining, those days that make you want to splash around naked.
i wish i was in the ocean right now, or a lake. alex and i swam across a lake and back, i really like swimming.
wow, my thoughts are all over the place, maybe this isn't a good time to be doing this, i need to get outta here.
peace out you.
my new neighbor told me i was hot, then followed it up with, we're gonna go do bongs.

waiting for drugs waiting for drugs
nervous for tomorrow
gotta get up early--sortof
heard a really enthusiastic girl getting fucked last night
there were at least 3 other people involved
at 3am
outside
they were on the second floor
and the people i was smoking with got a laugh
and it made me extremely happy to hear such...
elation?
ecstasy...ecstasy.
waiting for drugs sucks.
damn hartford traffic
and this infucktion in my lungs.

i need a donation to the intoxication foundation
oiriginally established in ye olde schneiter-dome
but presently moving headquarters to my pocket
cuz i need some whiskey.

peace out.

when i was in highschool, we would spend the entire summer on mollys beach, camping out with bonfires and booze and endless amounts of drugs and people and skinnidipping...i never thought there might be a time when it wouldn't be a part of my life. alright, thats enough photos for now. oh, in 15 minutes or so i will be 20 legally. crazy depressing.
BLIS <3

i slept all day i slept all day i slept all day.
finished off my pills, and sittin on some e.
i made a still image movie using the photos on my computer of me and my friends...windows movie maker sucks fat sausage and i am boycotting the shit cuz its so incompetent it makes me want to wriggle out of my chair while screaming. ugh.
i get my super8 back tomorrow!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
wing dinger, gonna be up all night! i drank 2 cups of coffee and one cup of tea in the midst of a very slow growing, never fully showing epiphanie while in the d.c.
i think the moral of that story was that i need to start leting my creativity out again, it wants to play.
fuck am i horny. sorry for the bluntness but it just so happens that i'm feelin the heat right about now.
i have had some fucking bad bad nightmares over the past 2 days...but the first one was the worst.
check ya.
erin, you and i need to speak privately, after class.
<not real class, this class, the one that i'm ending right now.>
what?

ok, i'm leaving for real. sorry pops.

my greatest fear when i was little was cookie monster banging on my screen in the middle of the night while screaming....fucking scary as shit.
some asshole just set off a firework outside my window and startled me so bad i thought i was dying.

current fears:
a plane crashing into my building (a house in my hometown just got destroyed because a plane crashed into it)
heart attack
crazy people in the woods
being entirely alone with no one else in the world
cookie monster banging on my window--or anyone for that matter (especially cuz i live on the 4th floor)
losing my rational thought completely
that i will kill someone accidentally


i think i am most afraid of going insane completely. because if/when it happens, it wont be the quirky funny insane that they portray on tv...it will be violent and paranoid and painful..............

bleh! i cant think about this shit or else i will dream that it happens.
i need to masterbate and clear my thoughts.
phew.

i am living out nufonia must fall
and i dont know if blis is coming in may, or at all for that matter. its ok cuz i know she loves me but i need someone here...hence my nufonious adventures with the girl i think i need to marry.
i <3 tricky's song, makes me wanna die, and i <3 lentil soup.
i hate waking up sweaty and i hate stomach pains.
i keep having wet dreams about my serendipidous lover, which is probably better than actually being with her... cuz i don't know her that well, but i get the feeling shes a bitch(i always fall for the bitch)
but anyway, it makes me wake up all sweaty and makes me wanna sleep allah the time.
i'm really nervous to get my super8 film back on monday...i'm hoping that seeing myself naked on screen will boost my confidence, but will probly just diminish it.
dats all folks

if you could only have seen the things i have seen in the past 24 hours....
and although i only got 3 hours of sleep last night, i still am not tired. while i was sleeping, i was talking to myself in my head, working things out the way that i normally do; i told myself, you know how i feel, i feel like i just drank an enormous smoothie, and thats the way i have felt all day. at some times nauseous, at most times energized, but always with these fucking allergies.
my head is so congested and my nose and my eyes burn. and i havven't eaten enough today or drank enough water but i just cant get in the mood.
i want a keeper.
let me bitch some more.
i also want an ipod.
my brother has better toys than me.
i hate it when old friends who i really respect sell me out to new friends who are totally lame and just rich hipsters who don't know dick about life. i'm serious, she keeps blowing me off and it sucks. but oh well, it won't last, i know that we will, but they wont.
damn i'm a bitch. i'm definately overtired. i'm gonna eat some mad expensive soup.
-sneezesneezesneeze-

you know, i really love whiskey. most alcohol in general, being that i was raised by loving alcoholics; but cheap whiskey is really terrible stuff. its worse thaan cheap beer.

so, down to business:
i spoke to the boy i am going to marry today. i'm serious, we decided when we were 6,
and i never go back on my word.
hes into frisbee golf--what the fuck is this? you might ask... i'll tell you what, its
simply a product of the midwest, that is just like golf, except with a frisbee.
anyway, we're going to see eachother this summer and i'm super psyched cuz we havent 
seen-or even spoken-to eachother in like 4 years, and i think we are the same person, only
different gendered, and he plays golf with a frisbee while i sit around and whack off.
cool.
fuck buddys are overrated, theres no suspense or chemistry. i wish i had the balls to start
sleeping with the person i really want to be with.
i'm currently involved in a love affair with myself, and i just don't have the time or 
the energy for juggling two people at once.
the human imagination is underrated, way underrated. i think that instead of trying to clean
out your head, like people are always trying to do through meditation and expensive therapy 
and organized religion, people should just retreat more inside their minds where all of their
wildest dreams can come true.
i'm serious, i just lived out one of my number one fantasies last night while lucid dreaming:
i was travelling in a tour bus for some rediculous amount of time--like, 33 hours--with about a dozen of the best sudicide girls, and all i had to kill time with--besides the company of those lovely ladies-was a coloring book and twist up crayons.
see? perfection.
damn, i'm gonna go space the fuck out and dream up something else just as good...

i found a place i found a place i found a place!
its in noho right off the main drag with friendly neighbors and peeling paint and a really
old sink. i hope i get it, i havent put the downpayment on it yet, but i told the dude
it was mine...and he better respect or else i'll pop his ass!
i also shot my film on super 8 which involved me getting naked in the woods--very liberating--
and i spent all day yesterday drunk drunk and more drunk up at hospital hill exploring.
i <3 alex.
we had a good day.
i need a job
and i need to wash my shoes...or thow them out the window cuz they stink big time.
i did way too much drunken dialing last night and now my throat is swollen.
but it dont matter cuz i'm movin to noho as soon as classes are over!!!!

ok, i am so fucking slow in the head....
i've had a bad day, but didn't realize it until someone said, hey,
you're having a bad day...
ha! maybe i'm just too fucking chill to notice.
maybe i should keep saying fuck.
ok, yeah, so my car was towed, which sucks cuz i don't have the money
for that shit, or the fucking money, i should say. tack it onto the 
debt i'm accumulating!! over 2 grand baby and going strong!
but now i'll have to explain to my mother why i couldn't use my tax return
money to pay for it because i got my nipples pierced instead! that'll
be fucking fun. fuck fuck fuck.
oh well, its humurous.
one time, i broke up with my boyfriend of over a year, killed my computer,
lost my shoes in the mud in 30 degree weather, got my period, shit my pants,
and a whole slew of other things that i have blocked out all in one week.
when things go wrong, it usually just makes me deliriously happy.
cause i'm s-s-s-slow and ch-ch-ch-chillll.
i almost broke my computer tonight cause i spilled a shit load of
whiskey next to it and it was fucked up for a good 60 minutes, and i
was freaking the fuck out.
but now its fine...oh,and for no reason, the 2 button popped off-it made me laugh.
and for some reason i thought that wedging the control button up would help,
but it didn't and now its stuck all crooked and sticking up..hahahahha
i got laid and it was godd. ha! no, good, it was good. my neighbors hate me and my 
laugh.
i hate cilantro....seriously, i fuckin hate it.
ok, i don't know what the fuck quizotic means, but that stupid frog does the
same thing for every mood.
i need to get a garter belt.

i did it i did it i did it!
all by myself, i did it.
intensity falls short.
as does elation.
now i wanna flash my shit all over town!!!

hold on, i need to prerequisite this with the fact that i am drunk, so behold, the drunken schneiterdome:
everything here is beautiful.
the schneiterdome is how we refer to my house because it is the party spot. i am here now, my parents are in new orleans partying it up at the blues and jazz festival, and i am here with christine. i love it here. it is so beautifully chill. anytype of lifestyle is welcome. christine is talking to the first person she has ever been in love with who is an older male trying to kick the crack habit. but that is the beauty of my life, there are no judgements. i know that he makes her happy. 
i cannot even begin to speak of the epiphanies, memories. drunken beauty, and knowledge that has aquired here in my home, nor can i ever even begin to discuss the beauty present here. 
everyone is accepted, no matter what their reputation, no matter anything, they are accepted in the schneiterdome regardless of their history. heroin and crack addicts alike, graduates of upscale prestigous schools, kids who have grown in the ghetto, kids who have grown with a silver spoon in their mouth; everyone.
everyone is accepted here without any backstory at all. this is the most beautiful spot in the world.
i have watched heroin addicts grow into responsible adults, mental hospital patients mature and cure themselves, teenage angst be embraced and grown out of, promiscuous girls turn over another leaf....all inside this house of understanding.
it is a beautiful thing, and i owe it all to my parents who are in new orleans right now for the blues and jazz festival because music is what raised me, ,music is what i think of when i think of my parents and that is beautiful.
this house is blessed, this family is blessed, in whatever sense of that word is possible in a home of atheists, but we are truely the beauty here.
there is somehting magical in the schneiterdome, something to keep the youngsters coming back in search of refuge. 
i only hope to be as incredibly accepting and loving of everyone as my parents have been.
peace and love.

i wish i could remember.
maybe i don't.
i search the written documents on my computer
and find things that i have typed that i have
no recollection of even thinking. my mind is a 
maze that twists and turns with every lost 
memory refound and i am lost inside, searching
for the common thread between all of these 
things that i find later on once i can no 
longer remember their existence.
i don't know myself very well, and i surprise 
myself everyday.
not having a memory makes me able to look upon
both the past and the future very objectively.
although it causes great disassociation which
only makes me retreat into my mind even more...
but i guess thats ok, because the world can be
anything you want inside your mind.

"...everything of which one has ever been aware is a picture
invented by one's own mind.  The universe is the looking 
glass of the soul."           
                                 --Aleister Crowley, Diary of a Drug Fiend

half way through this entry i was busy with something
else, and i had a vivid memory involving my ex-girl
and its so incredible when a memory presents itself in 
full.  where i felt what i felt in the time span it took
me to smear blue paint over her orange painting both 
physically and emotionally, and i relived it completely.
and then it was gone within seconds, leaving behind the 
shell of a beautiful moment that i once experienced in the 
flesh to decay on the backburner of my mind.

why the fuck is it so hot in here?

i am so fucking wired....no drugs either
huh.
i think that its these long nights spent alone,
trying to entertain myself
that have made me turn into one of those people
who talk to themselves constantly.
seriously.
you should see me in my car, i'm a madwoman.

shit, i thought it was only 3 or so,
its fucking 5...that sucks, what the fuck have i 
been doing for so many hours???

oh man that hamster thing is funny, look at him go!

beautiful day
hormones on high
did good lighting
in film class
fucking paper to write
want to lay in the grass
hummus is good shit
reagan's got a new set
fucking paper
fucking paper
blis is back in a month<3 <3
i wish this keyboard made real hearts.

my boy-toy 4eva, ryan, and his boyfriend are total lesbians. they've been
watching way too much of the l-word, and they've turned all of their testosterony
cock loving penis sucking butt fucking energy into the self-absorbed
dramatics of the modern-day dyke with a u-haul................
which is to say, i am very much enjoying being single and watching from a 
distance.
film class was a bummer without my fave flave. dats all i got.
oh, except for that i really enjoy the sounds of summer outside my window.

dont worry, i have a contingency plan---driving an hour and half
with my best friend
to save my night from resentful anger
and end it at 3am with a bottle of wine..........sweeeeeeeet

i really fuckin hate when people trample on my privacy
it makes me want to punch this fuckin kid in the face
who keeps stuffing his face with popcorn and 
the fucking florescent light is driving me insane.
i cant handle this shit,
i wish i had somewhere to go.

this kid is a fucking moron and he has seen my sleeping space
that drives me nuts.
i wish i was fucked up
i wish i was fucked up 
i wish i was fucked up

last cigarette: after my drive from boston today
last kiss: a friendly i love you kiss or a porno sit on my face kiss?

last movie seen: mystery science theater 3000 shorts-but i was too drunk to really see it
last cuss word uttered: FUCK	
last beverage drank: mt holyoke water

Last time showered: this morning in my brothers fucked up tub

i really need to kick my suicidegirls habit.
i waste too much time in my head
while my stomach eats itself............
and i'm way too restless and horny
for all the work i need to do this w-w-w-week.

im gonna try to do this thing here.
i dont know if it will work.
i sort of forget about things.
clearly.
so maybe i can keep up with this one now that i'm 20...almost.
what the fuck-not even i understand that one

thinking about the days that used to be blue, tainted and fainting i walked the line between sane and fearless..."it took me too long to realize that i don't take good pictures cuz i've got the kind of beauty that moves."

It was very intense, you know...there were trash cans there, but they had already failed.  The ceiling was buckled under the weight-god knows how long the water had been collecting.  The panels were both dipping down a foot, ballooned out and spurting water...it wasn't even raining that hard today.  anyways, the fat shit was standing between the passing crowd and the falling water.  He yelled at us for staring-who can help it when your school's roof is caving in?

oh yeah-amerika the beautiful is just one big    subdivision.

this is not driving conditions. i apologize for any incoherence, wait, no i dont. 
i saw an old teeny black woman waiting to cross the street and reading a doctor seuss book.  that restored my faith in people that day.
i still hate them though...people, that is.  with this burden of intelligence, people are always trying to categorize themselves-that is, afterall what seperates our brains from other animals, the ability to categorize.  Of course it has become our biggest vice as a civilized society, because in order to fit into a neat column, you must compromise some of yourself.  this only leads to the hate, violence, and organized religions that are responsible for all of the world's problems.
people would be a much more likeable species if we lost all humility.  then at least everyone wouldnt be so uptight from anal retension.
